title: Exercise Tracker
description: An fitness tracker that allows users to create and update their daily workouts with resistance and cardio exercises. Users can view the statistics for all workouts they have logged.
installation:
1. Clone this repo
2. Open the repo locally
3. Open terminal in main directory and run 'npm install'.
usage:
When developing a new project, use this CLI application to automatically generate a well-structured README. Save time and effort!
1. Open terminal in main directory
2. Run 'node index'
3. Answer the prompts in the command line
4. Copy the generated README into your intended project repo
contributing: Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change. Please make sure to update tests as appropriate.
questionsMessage: Feel free to contact us with any questions regarding this project!
